title: Trist destroys Turrets too fast?
body:
Jinx had to overextend with 0 escape mechanisms to destroy Turrets and got nerfed but Trist just does it and Can rocket Jump out or Blow you away, has a completely safe lane phase and scales insanely into late game being possibly one of the strongest late gamers there is...

Have you actually played vs Janna and Trist?

Omg that lane is hell. You can't poke. You can't engage, you need like 10 gap closers to get to her then she just rocket jumps out and walks back in, then you need to blow like 5 flashes to get to her and she just flashes out then walks back in.

Jinx is weak right now, she was nerfed when she didn't need it - now with all this Randuin's BS - her attack speed being the highest in the game and having synergy with on-hits but her kit not backing it up (no escape/dash) she is heavily Crit orientated plus her rockets can splash Crits and she got nerfed then you added Randuin's which is in like very single game and you just flat out deal no damage to the Riven's, Kha'Zix's and even Talons that take it whilst having no escape mechanism.

This patch and the last few have left her lower and lower on the viable list and she is a 1/100 game pick and only taken if you have a huge frontline but even then lacks a lot of damage on their front-line so your front-line just plain loses to Champions like Twitch, Tristana and Kog'Maw who all got insane buffs, plus Twitch and Kog have huge Blade of the Ruined King Synergy and you literally escalated 9 ADC's above Jinx in a few patches which is really just plain not fair for people who like playing the hyper positioning Loose Cannon.

replies.body: Oh quit your whining jinx is the highest win rate ADC.

Ashe and Varus have higher win rates, but with the Changes to Armor - Champions like Gap closer AD Assassins have been buffed (Yasuo, Talon, Zed) all of whom dunk on Jinx, plus The recent Randuin's Changes destroy her Crit based build and has been being taken on Assassins like Riven and Kha'Zix as well as Tanks and supports and Bruisers - so since last patch she is in a really bad place and I doubt win rates reflect anything in a game that changes this often, so while you might happily quote her win rates - if you actually look at what has happened in league in the patch like a week ago and run the numbers through your head - you'd see she's much weaker than previously and all the statistics in the world wont keep up with patches that heavily influence the game and while you might disagree - Jinx is terrible with Blade and average with alternate builds and was nerfed unnecessarily and is now even more weak.

Trist wrecks a Turret in 5 seconds and Jinx isn't allowed to?

She doesn't have a stronger lane phase than Trist. She doesn't have a stronger late game than Trist.

HER WIN RATE IS OF THIS PATCH 53% AND IS THE HIGHEST OF THE ADC'S (if you don't count morde)

http://champion.gg/statistics/#?sortBy=general.winPercent&order=descend&roleSort=ADC

Difference between Jinx and Trist;
Trist is an early and late game champion, Jinx is a early (her poke) and mid game champion
Jinx has less forms of escape and is more risk and reward then tristana.
Jinx has better damage then Tristana if it's not past 40 minutes.
Trist is the safer later game pick, Jinx is the riskier early game pick.

Dem bronze stats do.

Trist pushes insanely hard and kills turrets insanely fast. R.I.P my turrets, at least Jinx had to overextend to do so without 2 escape mechanisms and had to spend mana to do it also.
I didnt realise that a 175% movement speed buff didnt count as an escape mechanism, Indulge me with some more gold 5 knowledge please. Also how does jinx spend mana pushing down turrets?

"pushes insanely hard"
"at least Jinx had to overextend to do so without 2 escape mechanisms and had to spend mana to do it also"
she destroys it as fast as an adc should
if you took away trists tower pushing capabilities there would be literally no reason to pick her.
Well Tristana can place a bomb on the tower and her Q makes her attack faster. So I guess yes Tristana does destroy towers to fast but its how she is ment to be.
